name: Izumi Jiken File Vol. 3 - Yujuku-hen
storyline:
The player will be the female editor "Izumi". "Izumi" deduces murder cases while interviewing instead of the popular novelist "Kagamizuki" who is worried about a murder case and can't write a novel.

The novelist "Kagamizuki" has actually already finished deducing the culprit. "Izumi" will go to "Kagamizuki" when the criminal's eyes are revealed based on the information obtained by inquiries, etc., and will solve the mystery while answering the questions answered by "Kagamizuki".
Players who have solved the case can jump from the app to the web, browse the epilogue, and get the original standby screen.
summary:
The third popular detective adventure!
It is a detective adventure game where you can easily feel like a detective like reading a novel. Following the first "Shiosai Edition" on Kamakura and the second Kansai "Twilight Edition", the third "Yujuku Hen" will be set in Kagoshima, Kyushu. The player becomes the main character, a young editor "Izumi", and deduce the culprit based on the situation at the crime scene and the information collected in the interview. This "Yujuku Edition" is also actually on location in Kagoshima, and it is a full-fledged game composition.

Originally released in 2003 for Japanese mobile phones, it was later rereleased in 2007 as a "Deluxe Edition" with updated graphics.
